dcterms:creator: K. Soomro
A. R. Zamir
M. Shah
dcterms:description: A video dataset consisting of 13,320 video clips divided across 101 different action categories, at a spatial resolution of 320 by 240 pixels. Initially introduced for action recognition, it has been co-opted by the GAN research field to benchmark video GAN models.
dcterms:title: UCF-101

dcterms:creator: N. Aifanti
C. Papachristou
A. Delopoulos
dcterms:description: A dataset composed of 1462 video sequences of 86 people demonstrating 7 categories of facial expression; anger, fear, disgust, happiness, sadness, surprise, and neutral. The videos are recorded at a resolution of 896x896 pixels and range between 40-180 frames.
dcterms:title: MUG Facial Expression Database (MUG-FED)
